title: Tribute to Ekko Music

embed.description: Born in LA and my whole life I've grown up listening to all kinds of dance music. It's in my roots and I love using that to create the music I make now. **EMAIL: a13gaspi@gmail.com**

body: Just wanted to dip into making tracks for my favorite game. I love League and I love the different worlds they drop us in when they make and create these characters. With my style of music, I want to link that similar feeling that I share with with this game. Hope this finds you in the best way.

replies.body: Nice! Really dug jamming out to this :)
Nice dude ! Keep up the good work <3
